title: 2/BD, Pet friendly community, Polished quartz countertops
posting_body: Enjoy the conveniences and flexibility of an active adult lifestyle in Redmond, WA.
Specifically designed for those 55 and better, Reunion at Redmond Ridge is a truly modern living experience with an inspired suite of amenities.

Stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher*-Mountain, lake, and park views                                                                                        Featured amenity-12-foot ceilings on first floor-Built-in linen closet-Subway or mosaic tile kitchen backsplash-Polished quartz countertops-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Energy efficient designer lighting-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity

Walking distance to the Eastridge Drive Promenade-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-Pet friendly community-Across from Metro Bus stop-Resident social lounge and game room                                                                                         Featured amenity-Business center with co-working space and Wi-Fi-Community herb and vegetable garden-Close proximity to hiking and biking trails-Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Reading room
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
